heatequation module¶

heatequation.heatequation(Ta, Tb, T0, dx, dT, tend)[source]¶
Solves the heat equation $

rac{partial T}{partial t}=lpha abla^{2} T$ on $x in [a,b]$ from initial condition $T_0$, and boundary conditions $T(a,t)=T_{a}$ and $T(b,t)=T_{b}$.

Ta, float:
Boundary condition at $x=a$
Tb, float:
Boundary condition at $x=b$
T0, float:
Uniform initial temperature
dx, float:
spacing in $x$
dt, float:
spacing in $t$
tend, float:
final time

Returns:

T, array:
final temperature at time $t=$tend

Heat equation solver
